Name: Shabu Shabu
Review Text:

Name: Shabu Shabu
Review Text: Very nice all you can eat restaurant. you order with a tablet the food comes more or less very fast. the pics on the menu can be a little bit deceiving regarding the size of the food, but hey it's all you can eat.
